name: Fingering Pumpkins
description:
--- TUTORIAL ---

ARROWS === Move left and right

Q + E ====== Upper arm rotation

A + D ====== Lower arm rotation

SPACE ===== Close Hand

OBJECTIVE:

Move your friends to the jar without making them sad by bumping into things or running out of time.

--- ABOUT THE JAM ---

This is a game made by Conny Nordlund (KoniWorx) and Kevin Andersson (WhyKev) during a gamejam held by Aurora Punk for work.

Game Jam Theme: Horror

Time: 16 Hours

CREDITS:

Kevin Andersson (WhyKev) - Programming

Conny Nordlund (KoniWorx) - Art and Sound

Aurora Punks - Game Jam Host
